info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 9:11AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northeastern Geauga...northeastern Lake...southern Ashtabula and southwestern Crawford Counties Until 1015 AM EST.... At 911 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band 7 miles northwest of Andover, or 15 miles southeast of Ashtabula, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Painesville, Meadville, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Geneva, Madison, Perry, Andover, Linesville, Adamsville, Pymatuning Central, Harmonsburg, Pymatuning North, Atlantic, Austinburg, Roaming Shores, Pierpont, Cochranton, Cherry Valley, and North Perry. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 332.
